name: molecular-js
description: utilities to faciliate modular state management with Redux, ImmutableJS and Reselect

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js src --out-dir dist
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-register --recursive --ui bdd --require specSetup/setupChai.js src/**/*.spec.js
scripts.prepublish: npm test && npm run clean && npm run build
